ISSUE.TITLE: Duplicated locales (after nstallation)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 Steps to reproduce the problem: Sql query: ``` select ResourceName, count(*) from LocaleStringResource where LanguageId=1 group by ResourceName having count(*)>1 ``` Results: ![Capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2492378/209777173-3e5d3309-d29a-4231-9bc3-ba233dbf59fa.PNG)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6476 Match URL path and breadcrumbs on a product page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6495 Fixed problem with duplicated locales after installation
